summary: "Minority Report" is a 2002 sci-fi action film by Steven Spielberg, inspired by Philip K. Dick's story. Set in 2054 Washington, it features a police unit called Precrime that uses three psychics to predict and stop crimes before they happen. Tom Cruise plays John Anderton, the Precrime chief who becomes a fugitive after being accused of a future murder. The film combines mystery, thriller, and cyberpunk elements. It was well-received and made over $358 million worldwide. The technology in the film, like eye scans and interactive displays, seemed futuristic at the time but some have since become reality.
title: Minority Report (film)
